7  ButterworthFilter::ButterworthFilter(double freq, int order)
8  :
9  mFreq(freq),
10  mOrder(order) {
11  poles = new Cdouble[order];
12  switch (order) {
13  case 1:
14  poles[0] = 1.0;
15  break;
16  case 2:
17  poles[0] = 1.4142;
18  poles[1] = 1.0;
19  }
20  }
21 
22  ButterworthFilter::~ButterworthFilter() {
23  delete[] poles;
24  }

26  void ButterworthFilter::operator()(SeqViewComplex& data) {
27  Cmatrix* arg1 = data.GetData();
28 
29  double fstart = data.GetStart();
30  double fsampl = data.GetSampling();
31  double scale = data.GetScale();
32 
33 
34  data.SetStart(fstart);
35  data.SetSampling(fsampl);
36  data.SetScale(1.0);
37 
38  ButterworthFilter::execute(*arg1, fstart, fsampl, scale);
39 
40 
41  }

43  void ButterworthFilter::operator()(SeqViewComplex& datain, SeqViewComplex& dataout) {
44  Cmatrix* arg1 = datain.GetData();
45  Cmatrix* arg2 = dataout.GetData();
46 
47  if ((arg1->size1() != arg2->size1()) || (arg1->size2() != arg2->size2())) {
48  LogWarning("Resizing output view");
49  arg2->resize(arg1->size1(), arg1->size2());
50  }
51 
52  double fstart = datain.GetStart();
53  double fsampl = datain.GetSampling();
54  double scale = datain.GetScale();
55 
56 
57  dataout.SetStart(fstart);
58  dataout.SetSampling(fsampl);
59  dataout.SetScale(1.0);
60 
61  ButterworthFilter::execute(*arg1, *arg2, fstart, fsampl, scale);
62  }
63 
64  void ButterworthFilter::execute(Cmatrix &dataout, double fstart, double fsample, double scale) {
65  for (size_t i = 0; i < dataout.size2(); i++) {
66  double f = i*fsample;
67  Cdouble v = 1.0;
68  Cdouble s = Cdouble(0, f / mFreq);
69  Cdouble sN = s;
70 
71  for (int i = 0; i < mOrder; i++) {
72  v += poles[i] * sN;
73  sN *= s;
74  }
75  dataout(0, i) = 1.0 / v;
76  }
77  }
78 
79  void ButterworthFilter::execute(Cmatrix& datain, Cmatrix& dataout, double fstart, double fsample, double scale) {
80 
81  for (size_t i = 0; i < dataout.size2(); i++) {
82  double f = i*fsample;
83  Cdouble v = 1.0;
84  Cdouble s = Cdouble(0, f / mFreq);
85  Cdouble sN = s;
86 
87  for (int i = 0; i < mOrder; i++) {
88  v += poles[i] * sN;
89  sN *= s;
90  }
91  dataout(0, i) = datain(0, i) / v;
92  }
93  }
94 
95 }
